sentences.en: A great chocolate - coloured pall lowered over heaven.
sentences.cn: 一种巧克力色的帷幕从天上挂下来.

sentences.en: A pall of mystery seems to hang over it all.
sentences.cn: 整个事件似乎笼罩上一层神秘的气氛.

sentences.en: A pall of oily black smoke drifted over the cliff-top.
sentences.cn: 一团油腻的黑色烟雾飘到悬崖顶上。

sentences.en: A pall of smoke hung over the city.
A pall stretched for miles away from the island.
sentences.cn: 一股烟幕延伸出岛外达数英里之遥.

sentences.en: A sudden , dramatic tragedy cast an overhanging pall of gloom.
sentences.cn: 一场突发的悲剧在人们心头笼罩上一层阴影.

sentences.en: Already the allure of meals in restaurants had begun to pall.
sentences.cn: 饭店里的饭菜已经不像以前那样诱人。

sentences.en: An unwearied pall of cloud muffled the whole expanse of sky from zenith to horizon.
sentences.cn: 一望无际的云幕蒙住了从天顶到地平线的整个夜空.

sentences.en: Gradually, the novelty of city life began to pall.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，城市生活的新鲜感开始消失了。

sentences.en: His interest in his new job soon began to pall.
sentences.cn: 他对那份新工作很快便失去了兴趣.

sentences.en: I find his books begin to pall on me after a while.
sentences.cn: 我发觉他的书读过一阵子就开始对我失去吸引力.

sentences.en: It's one of the few delights that never pall.
sentences.cn: 它是几种永不使人乏味的乐事之一.

sentences.en: The sky was now a pall of black cloud.
The unrest has cast a pall over what is usually a day of national rejoicing.
sentences.cn: 动荡的局势给往常举国欢庆的日子蒙上了阴影。

sentences.en: We don't want to cast a pall over the festivities.
sentences.cn: 我们不想给庆典蒙上阴影。

sentences.en: When the barge reached the shrine, acolytes removed the pall.
sentences.cn: 当驳船抵达圣地时，辅祭除去了柩衣。

trans.tran_cn: 柩衣，棺罩，棺材，帷幕，[宗]祭服
trans.tran_en: a cloth used to cover a  coffin (= a box containing a dead body )
if something palls, it becomes less interesting or enjoyable because you have experienced it before

trans.tran_cn: 感到无聊，厌烦，扫兴，使生腻，过饱
覆上棺布，以布幕遮盖，（酒等）走味，失味，使扫兴
